A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: While I understand that this film made some very controversial\, unconventional and unpredictable choices\, I feel the backlash by the fanbase is unwarranted. This film is great\, the acting is superb\, the character arcs (for the most part) are great and the action is amazing. This film was willing to do what fans were saying they wanted for years\, which is take the franchise in a new direction. I encourage anyone who is on the fence now about seeing this film to go see it and form your own opinion.
